page.title: 09Childrens games
page.content: Childrens games; ice cream soda, tin can alley, football, witches broom stick, polo, knocky nine door, nuts screws & bolts, fox & hounds, six ticks, British bulldog, round it up, stick in the mud, dead mans fall, shuttles, wally, blocky, hopscotch, chain tiggy, orange squash, marbles, tally-ho, butterfingers, cut, red lights, queenie, split the kipper, Chinese whispers, crocodiles & hunters.Stuck in the mud is when some- one is on & if they tig you you have to stand with your legs apart.If anybody goes through your legs you are free. When everybody is standing with their legs apart except for 1, that 1 will be on. Crocodiles & hunters is a game for 2 teams. The hunters run from one side of the pavement, pick up the treasure & run back. If they get bitten once they hop,twice & they die.
